title: The Progenitors (The Progenitors #1).
description: Coming back from a late night party, Ariana Sanders was attacked and subsequently turned into a vampire, Yup that's right a freaking vampire. Found by some members of the American Coven, Ariana is shocked to learn that everything we know about vampires is totally wrong. Sent to the New York Academy to train, Ariana learns all about progenitors and the importance of knowing your sire. Being of an unknown progenitor, Ariana is placed in all the novice classes with the hopes of her powers eventually manifesting. At the Academy, she makes a few friends and even has a crush but whatever sense of normalcy she was beginning to experience came crashing down when Ariana began to exhibit strong powers thought to be extinct which brings the unknown identity of her progenitor into limelight. From an unknown newbie vampire to one of the most wanted Vamps, Ariana was thrust into a life of danger, intrigue, power and romance. Given an elite guard the legendary Devon Summers, Ariana realises that all the guys she has ever known pales in comparison to her charismatic protector. Between school, evading enemies, searching for her progenitor and trying not to fall in love with Devon, Ariana is about to realise that her situation is a whole lot worse than she thinks.
author: Cassie   James
